channel.title: Nokia N82
channel.description: Does anyone here own one? I'm interested in buying one, and I was hoping you all could maybe give me some of your opinions of it. Or if someone has a better phone in mind I'd love to know. The main thing I need to know is if it gets under skirts relatively unnoticed.

item.title: Nokia N82
item.dc:creator: @ThAt0n36Uy Elijah
item.description:
@ThAt0n36Uy wrote:

Does anyone here own one? I’m interested in buying one, and I was hoping you all could maybe give me some of your opinions of it. Or if someone has a better phone in mind I’d love to know. The main thing I need to know is if it gets under skirts relatively unnoticed.
